solution_line_template: There are 48 teachers. There is 1 principal. There are {num_classes} classes × {students_per_class} students/class = {num_students} students.

The total number of people in Oxford High School are {num_students} people + {num_teachers} people + {num_principal} people = <<{num_students}+{num_teachers}+{num_principal}={total_people}>>{total_people} people.
